name: Items which should not routinely be prescribed in primary care - dosulepin
title: Dosulepin cost per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Dosulepin, formerly known as dothiepin, is a tricyclic antidepressant. NICE guidance on depression in adults has a ‘do not do’ recommendation:
Do not switch to, or start, dosulepin because evidence supporting its tolerability relative to other antidepressants is outweighed by the increased
cardiac risk and toxicity in overdose.
Due to the significant safety concerns advised by NICE, the joint clinical working group considered dosulepin suitable for inclusion in this guidance.
